handleClickEvent

name: js/domreplay/loader.js
elementByTagNameIterator
description:
Generator function that creates an iterator of
elements by tag name

name: initializeEvents
description: Initializes events on elements in the dom.

name: getFlatElementIterator
description:
Flattens the node tree and yields only,
HTML elements with tagnames that should,
be tracked.

params.name: mutation
params.description: mutation object from the mutation observer.

name: flatTagnames
description:
To ensure that the only top level element is captured in tagnames,
we need a filter. for example when a button contains an 'a' tag,
only the button is captured.

name: initializeMutationObserver
description:
Initializes mutation observer,
when ever a new element has been added, it will automaticly
add event listener to the element.

name: domloader
description:
Initializes events on existing elements,
and initializes the mutation observer when
document is ready.

name: js/domreplay/logger.js
Logger
description:
Logger Singleton class,
used for debug, error and warning logging

name: debug
description: Debug logging.

name: warning
description: Warning logging.

name: error
description: Error logging.

name: logging
description: Set to true if we should log debug information

name: js/domreplay/replay.js
js/domreplay/serverstorage.js
js/domreplay/state.js
getState
description: Gets the state from localstorage

name: setState
description: Sets state

name: clearStateStorage
description: Clears the state storage

name: stateIsEmpty
description: returns true if state is empy

return.description: true if state is empty otherwise false.

name: stateIsReplay
description: True if state is Replay

name: stateIsRecord
description: True if state is Record

name: stateIsReady
description: True if state is Ready

name: setStateReady
description:
Sets the state to ready.
Resolves when state has changed
It will reject whenever the current state is not ready.

name: setStateRecord
description:
Set state safely to record.
Resolves when the state has changed.
It will reject whenever the current state is not ready.

name: setStateReplay
description:
Set state safely to replay.
Resolves when the state has changed.
It will reject whenever the current state is not ready.

content: User css class .dom-replay-ignore on certian HTMLElements where i do not want to record anything.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "domreplayhud",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Hud for DOMReplay framework",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "webpack-dev-server --open",
    "build": "webpack -p --config webpack.prod.js && npm run build-lib",
    "build-lib": "rm -rf lib && babel src/js -d lib",
    "watch": "babel src/js -d lib --watch",
    "build-docs": "esdoc",
    "open-docs": "open ./docs/index.html"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "Es6",
    "Webpack",
    "Sass"
  ],
  "author": "Eskil Opdahl Nordland",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "DOMReplay": "file:../DOMReplay"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-transform-async-to-generator": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-class-properties": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-es2015-modules-commonjs": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-es2017": "^6.24.1",
    "css-loader": "^0.28.7",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-custom-theme": "^1.4.2",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "extract-text-webpack-plugin": "^3.0.1",
    "node-sass": "^4.7.2",
    "sass-loader": "^6.0.6",
    "style-loader": "^0.19.0",
    "webpack": "^3.8.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.9.3",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.1.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
